title: video1
transcript: Hello and welcome to our first language video. Today we will practice some basic greetings. Let's start with hello, good morning, and good evening. Repeat after me and try to pronounce each phrase clearly.

title: video2
transcript: In this lesson, we explore how to describe your daily routine. Pay attention to the verbs we use when talking about morning and evening habits. Try to think about your own activities and how you would explain them in the target language.
